title: Wrong way Butch
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Peter Smith and David Barclay
brief_description: Peter Smith, aided by Dave O’Brien as a factory operative who never does the right thing, offers some hints on industrial safety. As in the NFB of Canada “Accidents don’t happen” series, a humorous approach is successfully used to sweeten important lessons. Both a good comedy and an excellent training film for machine-tool workers, apprentices and pupils in technical schools.
